main event: A cylindrical object with flashing lights was observed by a civilian in Brooklyn, New York in September 1962.
interesting points: The object was the same size as a large plane, but had no wings, exhaust, or sound.
The object had flashing red and white lights on the end, but no tail.
The object was observed moving horizontally at a speed of 3-13 mph.
The object was observed at an altitude of 5,202 feet.
The observation was reported to the Department of the Air Force and the Defense Intelligence Agency.
sighted object: large cylindrical object with flashing lights
